gurmukhi: jb mhKwsr mwirE sB dYqn ko rwj ]
transliteration: Jab Mahkhaasur Maario Sabh Daitan Ko Raaj||
translation: When Mahishasura, the king of all deemons, was killed;

gurmukhi: qb kwier Bwjy sBY CwifE skl smwj ]51]
transliteration: Tab Kaair Bhaaje Sabhai Chhaadio Sakal Samaaj||51||
translation: Then all the cawards ran away leaving behind all paraphernalia.51.

gurmukhi: mhw bIr khrI duphrI ko Bwn mwno dyvn kY kwj dyvI fwirE dYq mwir kY ]
transliteration: Mahaa Boor Kahroo Doupahroo Ko Bhaan Maano Devan Kai Kaaj Devoo Daario Dait Daar(i) Kai||
translation: Supremely heroic goddess, with the magnificence of the sun at noon, killed the demon-king for the well-being of gods.

gurmukhi: Aaur dl BwijE jYsy paun hUM qy Bwjy myG ieMdR dIno rwj bl Awpn so Dwir kY ]
transliteration: Aur Dal Bhaajio Jaise Paoun Hoon Te Bhaaje Mech Indra Doono Raaj Bal(u) Aapan So Ddaar(i) Kai||
translation: The remaining demon-army ran helter-skelter in such a way, as the cloud speed away before the wind, the goddess with her prowess bestowed the kingdom on Indra.

gurmukhi: dys dys ky nrys fwry hY surys pwie kIno ABKyk sur mMfl ibcwir kY ]
transliteration: Des Des Ke Dares Ddare Hai Sures Paae Koono Abhkhek Sur Mandal Bicdaar(i) Kai||
translation: She caused sovereigns of many countries to bow in obeisance to Indra and his coronation ceremony was thoughtfully performed by the assembly of gods.

gurmukhi: eIhwN BeI gupiq pRgt jwie qhwN BeI jhwN bYTy hir hir AMbir ko fwir kY ]52]
transliteration: Eehaan Bhaoo Goupat(i) Pragad J3e Tahaan Bhaoo Jahaan Baithe Har(i) Har(i) Anbar(i) Ko Daar(i) Kai||52||
translation: In this way, the goddess disappeared from here and manifested herself there, where the god Shiva was seated on the lion-skin.52.

gurmukhi: ieiq sRI mwrkMfy purwny sRI cMfI cirqR aukiq iblws mhKwsur bDih nwm duqIAw iDAwie ]2]
transliteration: It(i) Sroo Maarkande Puraane Sroo Channdoo Charitra Oukat(i) Bilaas Mahkhaasur Badhah(i) Naam Doutooaa Dhiaae||2||
translation: End of the Second Chapter entitled ‘The Killing of Mahishasura’ as recorded in CHANDI CHARTRA UKATI BILAS of Markandeya Purana. 2.

gurmukhi: lop cMfkw hoie geI surpiq kau dy rwj ]
transliteration: Lop Channdakaadhoe Gado Surpat(i) Kau De Raaj||
translation: In this way Chandika disappeared after bestowing the kingship on Indra.

gurmukhi: dwnv mwry AByK kir kIny sMqn kwj ]53]
transliteration: Daanav Mdare Abhekh Kar(i) Koone Sanan Kaaj||53||
translation: She killed the demons and destroyed them for the well-being of the saints.53.

gurmukhi: Xw qy pRsMn Bey hY mhwN muin dyvn ky qp mY suK pwvYN ]
transliteration: Yaa Te Prasann Bhae Hai Mahaan Mounndi) Devan Ke Tap Mai Souch Paavain||
translation: The great sages became pleased and received comfort in meditating on the gods.

gurmukhi: j`gX krY iek byd rrY Bv qwp hrY imil iDAwnih lwvYN ]
transliteration: Jaggya Darai Ik Bed Darai Bhav Taap Darai Mil(i) Dhiaanah(i) Laavain||
translation: The sacrifices are being performed, the Vedas are being recited and for the removal of suffering, contemplation is being done together.
